title: Wildlife in the Rockies
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company

description: After many years of careful conservation, Banff and Jasper National Parks have become vast zoological gardens. Deer, moose, bear, big-horn sheep, birds and small animals that live above the treeline are natural subjects for the close-up camera, with a backdrop of snowy peaks of the Canadian Rockies. Photography: William H. Carrick
